Pre-Game Insights: Germany is starting a new era with a new-look squad after several key players retired.
Julian Nagelsmann remains in charge and has built a new squad with fresh faces.
Germany has won 7 of their first 13 matches under Nagelsmann, including a victory over Hungary in the Euros.
Hungary missed out on the knockout phase of Euro 2024 due to goal difference but have shown resilience.
The match is Germany's opening UEFA Nations League fixture in Group A3.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is held at the Merkur Spiel-Arena in Dusseldorf.
The fixture is part of the UEFA Nations League 2024-25 season.
Germany and Hungary have a historical head-to-head record with Germany leading 12-14 in wins.
